channel.title: Making a client from nothing
channel.description:
Ok im new to servers and im starting on a source (i think would be good) im on Fanz "your server" and his client doesn't have a place to edit which i think means i can't add like Godswords and special attacks to my server? looks like this. [IMG]http://i1100.photobucket.com/albums/g417/Viety1/Client2.png[/img]
Then when i open it there's no files just says run....
[IMG]http://i1100.photobucket.com/albums/g417/Viety1/client3.png[/img]
Any ideas oh and I like the client itself for me as a owner but i wouldn't want players to have it. If i wanted them to have a different client do i just use like a maybe a project insanity client? or make my own and if to solve my other problems anyone know a good tut on making a client from nothing? thanks!

item.title: Making a client from nothing
item.dc:creator: @Viety Viety
item.description:
@Viety wrote:

It’s a delta but ok no starting from nothing then haha

Read full topic

item.title: Making a client from nothing
item.dc:creator: @qazdawg qazdawg
item.description:
@qazdawg wrote:

Well what type of server is it? Also you will need to be willing to waste TONS of your life starting from scratch.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a client from nothing

item.description:
@Viety wrote:

Ok im new to servers and im starting on a source (i think would be good) im on Fanz “your server” and his client doesn’t have a place to edit which i think means i can’t add like Godswords and special attacks to my server? looks like this.

Any ideas oh and I like the client itself for me as a owner but i wouldn’t want players to have it. If i wanted them to have a different client do i just use like a maybe a project insanity client? or make my own and if to solve my other problems anyone know a good tut on making a client from nothing? thanks!
